name: Let me get that subtitle
body:
Let me get that subtitle
=========================

**You need subtitles?** I need alpha testers to use my subtitle app. Let's help each other. Now built on all the supported platforms. All feedback is welcome.

**Precisa de legendas?** Eu preciso de testadores alpha pra usar meu aplicativo de legendas. Vamos ajudar uns aos outros. Agora construído em todas as plataformas suportadas. Todo feedback é bem vindo.

***

Download links
=========
Windows: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/1788963/getsubtitle/v0.2.windows.zip

Mac: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/1788963/getsubtitle/v0.2.mac.zip

Linux 32: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/1788963/getsubtitle/v0.2.linux-ia32.zip

Linux 64: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/1788963/getsubtitle/v0.2.linux-x64.zip
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
